snippet: The Circuit of the Americas is only a year old, but because its design incorporates some favorite elements from other circuits, it seems familiar.
lead_paragraph: The Circuit of the Americas is only a year old, but because its design incorporates some favorite elements from other circuits, it seems familiar.

headline.main: Austin’s ‘Classic’ Track Wins Over Fans and Drivers
headline.print_headline: New 'Classic' Track Wins Over Fans and Drivers
